# Kitsune
Graceful and mysterious fox people. They have the ability to shapeshift into a fox, and have a strange connection to the No√∂sphere.
## Diet
- Can eat raw meat. - Will get poisoned by Theobromine (Chocolate, Tea, Coffee) and Allicin (Onion, Garlic).
## Benefits
- [color=#1e90ff]They are smaller than Humans, making them harder to hit.[/color] - Can fit in duffelbags. - Have the ability to shapeshift into a fox form, which grants them greater speed at the cost of fragility. - Uses their [color=red]claws[/color] to do heat damage. - [color=#1e90ff]Can summon a small wisp of flame to light up dark places.[/color] - [color=#1e90ff]Take 25% less heat and cold damage.[/color] - Greater chance of obtaining psionics.
## Drawbacks
- [color=#ffa500]Takes 20% more blunt damage, 5% more slash and piercing, and 50% more radiation damage.[/color] - [color=#ffa500]Takes 30% more blunt damage, and 20% more piercing and slash damage in fox form.[/color] - Capable of taking holy damage, but at a reduced amount. - Get drunk more easily then other species. - They are weaker and struggle to carry and pull things due to their small size.
